C

cloneRepo(String) - Static method in class org.Group2.ContinuousIntegrationServer
Clones a github repository to the folder ./clonedRepo that can later be built and tested.
compileMvnProject(String) - Method in class org.Group2.ContinuousIntegrationServer
Compiles a Maven project located in a specified directory.
ContinuousIntegrationServer - Class in org.Group2
A small lightweight handler for a server which implements core CI server functionality including webhook communication over http, cloning, building and testing of a github repository and then returning responses to the original Github commit.
ContinuousIntegrationServer() - Constructor for class org.Group2.ContinuousIntegrationServer
 
createBuildLogFile(JSONObject) - Method in class org.Group2.ContinuousIntegrationServer
Creates headers of build log-file, including git-commit sha, git-pusher email, and date/time

deleteDirectory(File) - Static method in class org.Group2.ContinuousIntegrationServer
Recursively deletes all files in the repo
dummyFunction() - Static method in class org.Group2.ContinuousIntegrationServer
Can be modified to trigger test errors.

G

getPushedBranch(JSONObject) - Method in class org.Group2.ContinuousIntegrationServer
Take a request from a git webhook and return a string with the branch the action took place on.
getRepoURL(JSONObject) - Method in class org.Group2.ContinuousIntegrationServer
Takes a JSON object from a github webhook request and returns the ssh url to the repository.

sendResponse(boolean, boolean, JSONObject) - Method in class org.Group2.ContinuousIntegrationServer
